This is my portfolio, which lives here spencerproject.com

Background

This version of the website was created in 2022. This was my first time incorporating 11ty as a CRM and deploying on netifly. So I am sure there are some less than perfect parts to my code.

Eleventy

Download the eleventy branch if you want a more modern setup using Eleventy to compile different formats into HTML and enable templating. See installation steps below, although I still need to write something up on how to host with Eleventy.

FAQ

Something doesn't work

I am sure there are issues so please let me know. I love fixing bugs! Let me know at amy@spencerproject.com
